CollabUserEngmtRecordLink.name: CollabUserEngmtRecordLink
CollabUserEngmtRecordLink.description: Represents an association between a CollabUserEngagementMetric and a Salesforce record.

MetricDate.description: The date of the gathered metric.

Name.description: The unique name of the CollabUserEngmtRecordLink object.

ObjectType.description: The object type of the Salesforce record, such as Account or Contact.

ParentRecordId.description: The ID of the Salesforce record.

UserEngagementMetricId.description: The ID of the CollabUserEngagementMetric record.
